item.description:
Join us to learn one method of building a no-dig garden bed that will produce an abundance of vegetables and herbs in the first season!

Sheet mulched beds can be installed over existing lawns or even weedy areas to create gardens without the toil of digging and turning earth. Soil strata is preserved allowing beneficial organisms to aid in creating fertile loam that benefits all involved.

You'll learn the basics of sheet mulching, see the condition of soil in older beds, and learn a bit about life in the soil.

Dress for a garden experience- possibly mud etc...
Bring gloves if you'd like hands-on participation
Bring a snack to share with others

And remember- "Friends don't let friends double-dig".
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal with the garden cart.
item.name: Sheet Mulch Garden Beds
